column1: 1,Verify Successful Checkout Process with Added Item to Shopping Cart,Navigate to the home page and login. Add an item to the shopping cart and proceed through the checkout process. Verify that the checkout is successfully completed.,"Step 1: Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/

- Step 4: Click on input field 'lastName'
- Step 5: Enter input value in input field 'lastName'
- Step 6: Click on input field 'postalCode'

column1: Step 7: Click on button 'finish' -> Navigate to page 'checkout-complete.html'
